title: How Many Species Exist
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on How Many Species Exist.

hook.text: Scientists have described about 2 million species. The real number may be 8 to 10 million.

discovery.text: The deep ocean, soil, and tropical canopy are least explored. They hold the most unknowns.

twist.text: We may lose species to extinction faster than we can discover and name them.

climax.text: Cataloging life on Earth is a race against time â€” and science is losing.

punchline.text: We share the planet with millions of neighbors we've never met.
